hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Monday Red - Red Auditorium
hiveArticle.body:
I recently went to watch Jurassic World- The Fallen Kingdom in a new movie theater nearby and thus I amazed to see the creativeness inside the auditorium. Basically in an auditorium you do not want to see other than the screen but this made us to have a good look around in the interval as well as at the end of the movie .

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/iii5xvvz61.jpg)

<hr>

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/oj4mm61z49.jpg)

<hr>

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/gxv1a9hu3b.jpg)

Camera : Nokia 6
